description:
An exclusive BTC Sports Ordinal Collection of 99 unique, 1/1 NFTs minted in STX and inscribed in Bitcoin! Once inscribed the Ordinal ID will be included in the STX Metadata for authenticity.

Both the Ordinal & STX NFT will have its own separate benefit/utility. The Ordinal Collection will enjoy free drops, WL spots & priority access on everything BTC Sports Ordinal related.

The STX NFT Collection will have a Token Generation Rate (TGR) of 600% over the base, it will be expanded into a Gaming Collection, enjoy BTCS loyalty token generation and other benefits as the Project develops.
name: BTC Sports Ordinals
